EditContext_API.summary: NOTE Experimental The EditContext API can be used to build rich text editors on the web that support advanced text input experiences, such as Input Method Editor (IME) composition, emoji picker, or any other platform-specific editing-related UI surfaces.

remarks.para: With the EditContext API, you get the flexibility to render your own editable text region using any technology you want.

EditContext_APIGuide.summary: The EditContext API can be used to build rich text editors on the web that support advanced text input experiences, such as Input Method Editor (IME) composition, emoji picker, or any other platform-specific editing-related UI surfaces.

remarks.para: This article goes over the necessary steps to build a text editor using the EditContext API. In this guide, you will review the main steps involved in building a simple HTML code editor that highlights the syntax of the code as you type, and that supports IME composition.
